【 EASY OPERATION】Universal socket with strong magnetic Screwdriver, and Bendable Extension Cable for corner to drive screw with screwdriver replaceable head, with those tools, your work will be easier, Ideal for women and DIY.
【 UNIVERSAL SOCKET 】Unique design of this universal socket can automatically adjust to any size or shape, suitable for standard 1/4 to 3/4 inches and metric 7mm to 19mm screws, nuts, and blots, meeting all your needs. Compact and portable to anywhere you want.
【 SCREWDRIVER 20PCS/SET】Different screw hat, you need different driver.
【 STRONG MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVER】 Strong magnetic can keep the screws from dropping, and fixed the position of screw, in case of over drilling.
【 BENDABLE EXTENSION CABLE】 This cable can be bent, twisted and rotated at many different angles. It can be drilled into a small space, in a variety of gaps, rather than your hand, flexible installation work. Let this flexible drill bit extension tool help you solve more problems quickly.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);

var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

);

Product Description

Specification:

Size: 4*3.6*6Ft (length*width*height)Leading Wire length: 9FtTether length: 10FtMaterial: Inflatable: IP44 waterproof polyester，water bag: PVCProduct color: brown mainlyProduct element: Gingerbread Man + Christmas Hat + Christmas Candy CaneNumber of LED lights: 2Lighting mode: steady onLighting color: cool whitePower supply: plug (12V-1A)

Package Includes: 1 x Christmas Gingerbread Man Inflatable 4 x Plastic ground stakes 3 x Long Tethers 1 x water bag 2 x Built-in LED Lights 1 x Adapter 1 x Built-in Blower 1 x Manual

[ Inflatable Christmas Gingerbread Man Decorations ] A Fun for 6 Ft tall sitting Christmas Inflatable Gingerbread Man with Christmas hat, holding a candy cane in his left hand. Includes an inflatable, 4 ground stakes, 3pcs 10ft tethers and 1 water bag, a plug and built-in fan.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ Light up Xmas Decor ] The Christmas inflatable Gingerbread Man with 2 LED lights built inside, light up your yard and lawn at nights. Bringing your family, neighbors and guests endless surprises and joy.
[ Fast Inflation ] With 1A built-in fan and 12V adapter with UL certification. Fully self inflates in minutes with built-in fan after plug into a standard electrical outlet. After the parties, just unplug the Christmas decor and fold it up for storage and reuse. An zipper at the bottom of inflatables for fast deflation.
[ Stability and Sturdiness ] Come with water bag, tethers and stakes. Simply fill the water bag with sand or water and put it into the inflatables. And use the stakes and tethers to fix it when used outdoor ground. Made of waterproof polyester fiber, which is not easy to fade and damage.
[ Christmas Party Decorations ] The Christmas decoration is festival and cute. Suitable for Christmas outdoor decoration, yard, lawn, garden, etc.

Product Description

Hear Rate Monitoring

Android smart watch with the latest built-in heart rate sensor, can effectively accurate measure your heart rate. Meaning you can know of pulse rate changes in real time.

Blood oxygen and pressure monitoring

Digital watch with the latest built-in sensor, you can measure Blood Pressure and see how much oxygen is in your blood. Check your health status at any time.

Music Control

Find and turn on music controls in your fitness watch for quick and easy control of your music (play/pause, next/previous song) during training sessions.

Sleep Quality Monitoring

The mans womens smart watch can automatically monitor and analyze your sleep quality in real time 24 hours a day, and accurately monitor the sleep situation for nearly 7 days.

Customize You Watch Face

1.69″ touch touchscreen, you can customize the watch face to enjoy a variety of cool watch faces. You can even customize the watch face based on your own photos or favorite pictures.

IP68 Waterproof

Waterproof watch is an IP68 waterproof standard, You can wear it while washing your hands or in the shower, or even while swimming.

Call and Mesaages Notificatio: Smart watch for android phones will vibrate to remind you when your smartphone receives call notification, SMS and APP messages (WhatsAPP, Facebook, Messenger, Instagram) so you don’t miss every message.
1.69 Inch Full Touch Screen: This smart watch for android compatible features a 1.69 inch TFT-LCD color display for outstanding HD quality. Zinc alloy case and silicone strap, make you more comfortable to wear. You can choose from140 + personalized watch faces, or set your favorite photo from your phone as a watch face.
24 Hours Health Monitoring: This smart watch for man women features real-time heart rate monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, blood oxygen monitoring, exercise recording and sleep monitoring, accurately records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned a fitness watch to monitor your health at all times.
IP68 Waterproof: This activity trackers and smartwatche is designed with IP68 waterproof rating, so you can have no worries when washing your hands or swimming in the pool.At the same time, this fitness trackers for women man has 8 sports modes include walking, running. cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, swimming.

NITAGUT is a store that specializes in men’s fashion.Focus on creating trendy, casual,classic and excellent men’s clothing!

We use American sizes and buyers can buy them with correct size.

And our clothes are mostly made of excellent fabrics.

We bring happiness and sunshine in life to men who pursue comfortable and fashion！

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.35 x 7.24 x 0.39 inches; 1.13 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 14, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B099DNBMYT

Imported
Machine Wash
NITAGUT Mens Shawl Collar Pullover Sweater is made of high quality fabric,The fabric is comfortable and stretchy ,so the stylish sweaters will provide a soft and warm wearing experience in cold weather and make you look elegant and casual!
The Cable Knit sweater for man is in US size. it’s very well made and will fit you perfectly.The casual sweater has a V-neck design,It also has Shawl Collar, Cable knit, Ribbed cuffs and hem, and Button decoration. The structure of the sweater itself is very good. There are no loose seams or uneven seams and the sweaters are woven with beautiful symmetrical patterns which will keep you getting compliments constantly!
Our v-neck soft pullover sweater is suitable for spring, autumn and winter ,It’s also a great addition to daily,business, work, party, dating, street strolling,travelling, sporting, skating,Halloween costume or any other leisure occasions. The long sleeve sweater for men can be a wonderful and considerate winter gift for your father, boyfriends,husband,son or your friends!
The Stylish Pullover sweater looks great with many daily dress.It can be paired with jeans to create a smart leisure look, or layer with jackets or coats to keep warm in cold days.Of course sports pants, casual pants, T-shirts and hoodies can also be perfectly matched with this sweater.This Cable Knit sweater comes in many colors, which also allows you to match all kinds of clothes you like!
In order to protect the fabric and to keep the the sweater comfortable,you can take the following ways to wash your sweater：dry clean or hand wash or Machine wash in Laundry Bag.After that,It’s better to lay the sweater flat to dry.Please don’t bleach and avoid putting this into the dryer after washing. otherwise the sweater may not keep its shape.Due to computer image resolution and monitor settings, the color may vary slightly depending on the website.thank you for your understanding!
